parameters.name: BindMiniProgram
parameters.description:
Whether to enable binding to a mini program:
- **Y**: Enable
- **N (default)**: Do not enable
><notice>If enabling the binding of a mini program, please ensure all parameters for the mini program are passed.></notice>

parameters.name: CheckFileBody
parameters.description: Content of the uploaded verification file.

parameters.name: CheckFileName
parameters.description: Name of the uploaded verification file.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description:
Binding mini program platform:
- **WECHAT**: WeChat
- **ALIPAY**: Alipay
- **TIKTOK**: TikTok

parameters.name: StoreImage
parameters.description:
Whether to enable delivering the authentication files generated during the authentication process to the user's OSS:
- **Y**: Enable
- **N (default)**: Disable
